courseDescription:
Blockchain is a relatively new technology, and its effect is far-reaching. With it comes new opportunities for those interested in venturing into this promising technology. As with any new technology, there needs to be more authentic information and resources available to enter the world of blockchain technology. This free course simplifies the concept of blockchain for you and helps you on your way to becoming a blockchain architect. It outlines the critical skill required and demonstrates a learning path to help you begin, build and enable your blockchain career.

This course aims at making the concept easy for beginners. We have designed the content around the assumption that you are new to blockchain technology and want to build your career or improve your skill set around this. First, we will give you an idea of blockchain and a blockchain architect's scope of work by learning about its application on Amazon. We introduce the career path, the skill set required, and the salaries offered in the field. We guide you on the required certifications, training and coaching methods. We provide tips, tricks, and techniques to face blockchain interviews and become a winner. By the end of this course, you will be able to understand the applications of blockchain and how you can plan a career as a blockchain architect.

This course is an introductory course for anyone interested in becoming a blockchain professional but uncertain how to begin. We have designed this course for novices who want to learn blockchain but need more knowledge. It informs you about the competencies required and the use cases of blockchain and provides the resources with a learning path to get started in this space. So if you aspire to be a blockchain expert architect, why wait? Enroll today to begin an exciting new career.
